::Cledar::

The spin throws Cledar off balance, making him stuble and bump into 
one of the heads, then slash at it. The bite had missed because he'd 
stumbled.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The blade has problems penetrating Sinnertwin's thick armour, and 
before
> it can do any dammage he spins around, lashing out with each mouth 
at
> Cledar.
